author: finnlabe
body:
#### PR description:

Updating the B2G DQM code with a few small threshold and binning changes to improve their readability and make them useful also with smaller statistics, in the context of preparing using the multi-run harvesting tool under development in the STEAM subgroup.

The only expected changes of this PR are in the B2G HLT monitoring histograms, there are no other changes or dependencies.

#### PR validation:

The PR was tested by running the DQM code on a RelVal sample to ensure the relevant histograms are filled and properly binned. The relevant test commands were run.
title: B2G HLT DQM threshold and binning changes
